QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.device_exposure_id , t.person_id , t.device_concept_id , t.device_exposure_start_date , t.device_exposure_start_datetime , t.device_exposure_end_date , t.device_exposure_end_datetime , t.device_type_concept_id , t.unique_device_id , t.quantity , t.provider_id , t.visit_occurrence_id , t.visit_detail_id , t.device_source_value , t.device_source_concept_id , t.production_id , t.unit_concept_id , t.unit_source_value , t.unit_source_concept_id FROM {sc}.device_exposure as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by 2
